transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan. Hello, Syed ji baat kar rahe hai Beauty Burqa House se?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ji, main Black baat kar raha tha IndiaMART.com se senior manager sir. To aapke regarding maine connect kiya tha aapne feedback diya tha sir not satisfied aapki video meeting hui thi Shahnawaz ke saath aapke jo account manager hai. Uske regarding aapne feedback diya tha kuch issue aaya tha sir bataiye abhi.
Customer: Baat hi nahi hua unse.
Executive: Aapne ek feedback diya tha not satisfied ka services ko lekar. Haan haan haan haan not satisfied ka feedback actual unhone morning mein call karne wale the to morning mein call bhi nahi kiya hai.
Customer: Aur phir lunch time mein call kar rahe the phir baat chit hua hi nahi matlab wo not feedback mein wo thoda sa wo ho gaya hai. Magar unse mera baat hi nahi hua hai sir.
Executive: Baat karna hai?
Customer: To ye feedback galti se chala gaya aapka? Ye feedback galti se gaya hua hai.
Executive: Achcha sir yaha pe wo abhi sab theek hai services ko lekar koi issue to nahi hai sir?
Customer: Issue matlab mera kuch lead khatam ho gaya hai. Main kuch check kar raha tha yaar kaam hi nahi ho raha hai. Mere ko samajh nahi aa raha IndiaMART mein kaam kyun nahi ho raha hai. Unsuccessful mera aapka jo hai na matlab jo lead tha jo.
Executive: Haan. Lead to main consume nahi kar paya. Kaafi din mein busy tha. Abhi main panel pe baitha hu to maine kal raat se hi pura lead mera khatam ho gaya hai. Aur ek bhi kaam nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Haan wo aapne pura kar pura consume kar liya. Aur ek bhi kaam nahi aa raha daily isme.
Executive: Achcha. Main aapko ek Bangalore ka likha hai puch raha hu bole hum Ranchi se bol rahe hai. To iska kya matlab humko nahi samajh mein aata hai.
Executive: Achcha location ka issue aa raha hai matlab. Location main likha hai to us hisab se hum usi direction mein chal raha tha phir bol raha is taraf main Ranchi se bol raha hu.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai in par kuch dekhne mein lekin main real abhi kya hum log ne real gold ka bhi kaam kiya hai to usme maine kuch buyleads real gold ka bhi dekh raha tha.
Customer: Usme kya system nahi pata hai. To maine baat chit kiya Birbhum ka ek party tha. To unhone last mein sab kuch 18 carat ka vagaira unka jo requirement dala tha phir maine jinko inko bola ki humko imitation jewellery chahiye.
Customer: Hmm. Ajeeb baat hai.
Executive: Nahi isme dekho aapke na category business mat karo sir.
Customer: Jo aap jisme deal kar rahe ho aap usi mein jaise burqa aur abaya mein deal kar rahe ho aap. To aap usi mein deal karo baki usi usi mein kar raha hu kar raha tha usme kuch ho nahi raha hai to maine kaha kyun na hamara dusra kaam bhi hai to uska bhi try karte hai. Hamara jo gold ka bhi kaam hai.
Executive: Achcha sir jo isme main issue ye hai aapka jo consumption karte ho na aap aap wo ek hi din mein baith ke kar le rahe ho sara. Aisa nahi karna hai aapko wo daily basis par ek se do buylead aapko consume karni hai. Aapko hafte mein 14 buylead milti hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sorry 17. 17 buylead aapko hafte ki milti hai 10 buylead matlab daily aur ek 10 buylead weekly aur ek daily. Is tarike se 17 milti hai. To keval do buylead aap daily use karo do se teen buylead jo aapko relevant lagti hai. Aisa mat karo ki sari buylead ek hi din baith ke consume kar di usse itna achcha result nahi aayega. Do se teen buylead daily basis par aap consume karoge to unpe response bhi achcha aayega aur wo bilkul aap active use karo matlab jo aaj ki post hui hai do ghante char ghante pehle lead. Usse aapka response bhi achcha aayega. Pata hai sir kaafi agar aap late buylead consume karte ho aur usko connect karte ho to buyers pe already kaafi log connect kar chuke hai seller. To unke pass kaafi call chali jati hai to wo irritate hokar ye reply de dete hai ki main nahi main tere yaha se baat kar raha hu ya meri demand nahi hai requirement nahi hai taki call further na aaye unke pass.
Theek hai to us cases mein aap usko particularly active buyleads matlab jo aaj ki posted hai agar aap aaj dekh rahe ho to wo aaj ki hi consume karo. Theek hai sir purani buylead aap consume mat karo aur ye jo dusre real mein product ki hai main aap majorly deal kar rahe ho keval wohi deal karo.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur bhi baki matlab agar product mein deal karte ho to wo apne catalog pe list kara lo.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Abhi aapka jo main kaam hai burqa ka kaam hai to aap uski usi pe focus karo baki agar gold vagaira wo ek alag category ho gayi aapki. Right sir?
Customer: Hmm. Fabric aur phir gold dono cheeze alag alag ho gayi. Usme wohi importance aapki yahi rahegi isme ki relevancy aapki increase ho jayegi agar aap ek hi product mein isme ek ek cheez hum add kar sakte hai kya matlab jaise hamara garments ka hi jaise job work hota hai hum log t-shirt bhi main inquiry kar raha tha last 15 days se main polo t-shirt vagaira iska bhi hamare pass kya unit hai pura.
Customer: Hmm. To usme bhi apun matlab ki hamare polo t-shirt dal sakte ho aap. Haan haan. Dal sakte ho polo t-shirt. Aap add kar sakte ho usme koi dikkat nahi hai. Kyunki wo garments related hai iske liye. Haan garments related jo bhi aapke jo GST HSN code mein hai wo cheez aap dal sakte ho usme koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm. Theek hai na garments aur fabrics mein deal karte ho to usme aap wo dal sakte ho isme koi bhi aapko koi tension nahi hai. Hmm. Theek hai sir baki catalog quality score aapka abhi kuch product hai jinke regarding matlab aapka catalog quality bhi wo better karna hai. Wo usme agar aap description vagaira add kar denge to aur achcha relevancy matlab usme aane lagegi aapki. Abhi jo total aapke product hai mere pass jo listed hai wo total 93 product hai jisme se paanch product low score hai. Ek aapka handcraft kurti with block print hai. Agar aap haan haan hai.
Customer: Hai. Theek hai isme aapne jo hai kurti jaise ki aapko royal choices isme price iska 550 ko stop karna chahta hu. Main nighty ko stop karna chahta hu kyunki nighty mein bahut competition hai isme kaam nahi ho paya. Main nighty ko stop karna chahta hu. Main isliye Sanawaz bhai ko us din bola aap morning mein baat kar sakte hai kya phir morning mein unhone call hi nahi kari mujhe.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai wo morning mein baat kar lenge aap se nighty to main yaha se hata du aapka?
Customer: Nighty ko main hatana chahta hu kyunki usme kaafi complicated ho gaya hai usme market karna hi mushkil ho gaya hai.
Executive: Theek hai nighty ye maine hata diya hai aapka ladies cotton nighty aur ye aapka ye maine remove kar diya hai. Theek hai iske alawa main baki call arrange aapko karwa dunga. Ye feedback ke regarding maine call kiya tha to isko main abhi close kar raha hu conversation ko aapke pass ek feedback ka mail aayega aap usko satisfied reply kar dijiyega please. Theek hai main kal morning mein aapko ye call arrange karwa deta hu. Theek hai na?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai aapke pass mail aayega usko satisfied reply kar dijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai thank you sir have a good day. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to stop selling nighty due to competition.

- Leads are expiring, work not happening on IndiaMART.

- Location issue with leads from different cities.

- Wants to add polo t-shirts to the catalog.



Resolution:

- Agreed to remove nighty from the catalog.

- Executive explained how to consume buyleads effectively.

- Agreed to arrange a call in the morning.

- Confirmed polo t-shirts can be added to the catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a call in the morning.

- Customer to reply to the feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, nighty, polo t-shirt, location
